description:
A first class OpenVPN client that lets you secure your network with ease & style.


added
Support for AWS Client VPN SAML authentication
added
Support for WatchGuard SAML authentication
added
Import from Server support for WatchGuard devices
added
Support for connecting to HTTP and SOCKS proxies using IPv6
improved
Updated localizations
improved
Allow an optional separate CA to be specified when using PKCS#12
improved
Automatically exclude a transport SOCKS proxy from the VPN connection
updated
OpenVPN updated to version 2.6.17
updated
OpenSSL updated to version 3.0.19
fixed
Workaround for VPN adapter activation failures on PCs with Driver Store issues
fixed
Resolves a potential reachability failure when connecting using a HTTP or SOCKS proxy
fixed
Various bug fixes and enhancements
